I also serve as the director for the Bioinformatics core of the INBRE Project. My principal research interests are the implementation of mathematical, statistical and engineering techniques in the area of computational biology, bioinformatics, and medical informatics.  A  more specific area of my actively funded research is the problem of protein folding, protein/ligand and protein/protein interaction.
